alert.note: Alert for Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued May 09 at 5:28AM EDT until May 11 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...1 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the southern Pamlico Sound, Trent, Bay and lower Neuse Rivers, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
